name: Attack Up
desc: Base Attack +1%

name: Defense Up
desc: Base Attack +2%

name: Critical Rate Up
desc: Crit Rate +3%

name: Repel Damage
desc: Repel Rate +1%

name: Resist Up
desc: All Resist +1%

name: Accuracy Up
desc: Skill Acc +1%

name: 10% HP Recovery
desc: Party HP Heal 10%

name: 10% SP Recovery
desc: Party SP Heal 10%

name: Weather: Thunderstorm
desc: Shocks a random target. Crit dmg up.

name: Weather: Heat Wave
desc: Inflicts Burn on a random target. If inflicted with Burn multiple times, take damage equal to max HP.

name: Weather: Pollen Warning
desc: Gives a random debuff to a random target. Increases spiritual ailments in battle.

name: Weather: Flu Season
desc: Elemental ailment resist up. Shadows may be affected by Influenza: Become Berserk, greatly increasing Attack, but die after a few turns.

name: Weather: Clear
desc: Random buff on a random target. When foe's defense is decreased, random buffs are removed, and damage taken up.

name: Critical Rate 1
desc: Crit Rate +10%

name: Critical Rate 2
desc: Crit Dmg +20%

name: Critical Rate 3
desc: When defeating a Shocked foe, heal 35% HP

name: Critical Rate 4
desc: When foes take Critical hits, Defense down

name: Critical Rate 1
desc: Crit Rate +10%

name: Critical Rate 2
desc: Increases critical damage by 20%.

name: Critical Rate 3
desc: When defeating a Shocked foe, heal 35% HP

name: Critical Rate 4
desc: When foes take Critical hits, Defense down

name: Critical Rate Set 2
desc: Critical hits gain bonus DMG and restore HP

name: Critical Rate Set 4
desc: After dealing a critical hit, increase critical damage by 10%, up to a maximum of 50% (activates once per skill).

name: Giant Killer 1
desc: Skill attacks have a chance to Burn targets.

name: Giant Killer 2
desc: After using a skill, insta-kill enemies that have less than 10% HP remaining (excluding bosses).

name: Giant Killer 3
desc: Fire attacks deal increased damage to enemies and decrease their Attack. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Giant Killer 4
desc: Increases damage when target's HP is higher than yours.

name: Giant Killer 1
desc: Skill attacks have a chance of Burning targets.

name: Giant Killer 2
desc: After using a skill, insta-kill enemies that have less than 10% HP remaining (excluding bosses).

name: Giant Killer 3
desc: Fire attacks deal increased damage to enemies and decrease their Attack. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Giant Killer 4
desc: Increases damage when target's HP is higher than yours.

name: Giant Killer 1
desc: Skill attacks have a chance of Burning targets.

name: Giant Killer 2
desc: After using a skill, insta-kill enemies that have less than 10% HP remaining (excluding bosses).

name: Giant Killer 3
desc: Fire attacks deal increased damage to enemies and decrease their Attack. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Giant Killer 4
desc: Increases damage when target's HP is higher than yours.

name: Giant Killer Set 2
desc: Increase damage by 2% for every 10% of the opponent's max HP higher than yours, up to a maximum of 30%.

name: Giant Killer Set 4
desc: When attacking with an active skill, inflict Bleed and deal 10% damage, up to a maximum of 2000 HP.

name: Healing 1
desc: Healing & Shield Bonus Up

name: Healing 2
desc: Healing Received/Shield Received Bonus Up

name: Healing 3
desc: Grants a shield when you receive healing

name: Healing 4
desc: Attack increases when you receive healing or a shield. Stackable.

desc: Healing & Shield Bonus Up

name: Healing 2
desc: Healing Received/Shield Received Bonus Up

desc: Grants a shield when you receive healing

name: Healing 4
desc: Attack increases when you receive healing or a shield. Stackable.

desc: Healing & Shield Bonus Up

name: Healing 2
desc: Healing Received/Shield Received Bonus Up

name: Healing 3
desc: Grants a shield when you receive healing

name: Healing 4
desc: Attack increases when you receive healing or a shield. Stackable.

name: Healing Set 2
desc: When HP is above 70%, increase Attack and Defense.

name: Healing Set 4
desc: The attribute bonus of the 2-piece set is doubled. Nullify insta-kill damage one time, and restore 25% HP (once per battle).

name: Status Ailment 1
desc: Ailment Accuracy

name: Status Ailment 2
desc: Decreases Attack of enemies with debuffs.

name: Status Ailment 3
desc: At the start of battle, Phantom Thieves have greatly increased ailment accuracy for 1 turn.

name: Status Ailment 4
desc: At the start of battle, enemies' damage is decreased for 1 turn.

desc: Ailment Accuracy

name: Status Ailment 2
desc: Decreases Attack of enemies with debuffs.

name: Status Ailment 3
desc: At the start of battle, Phantom Thieves have greatly increased ailment accuracy for 1 turn.

name: Status Ailment 4
desc: At the start of battle, enemies' damage is decreased for 1 turn.

name: Status Ailment 1
desc: Ailment Accuracy

name: Status Ailment 2
desc: Decreases Attack of enemies with debuffs.

name: Status Ailment 3
desc: At the start of battle, Phantom Thieves have greatly increased ailment accuracy for 1 turn.

name: Status Ailment 4
desc: At the start of battle, enemies' damage is decreased for 1 turn.

name: Status Ailment Set 2
desc: When attacking, damage is increased based on number of debuffs the target has.

name: Status Ailment Set 4
desc: Permanently increases all allies' Attack when inflicted an elemental or spiritual ailment in battle. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

name: Armor Break 1
desc: When enemies' Defense is decreased, increase damage taken by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 2
desc: When the enemy's Defense decreases, increase Phantom Thieves' Defense by 7%. Stacks up to 3 times. Each stack is calculated individually. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 3
desc: When the enemy's Defense decreases, permanently increase Phantom Thieves' Defense by 4%. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Armor Break 4
desc: When an enemy first takes damage, decrease their Defense by 25%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 1
desc: When decreasing a foe's Defense, increases damage taken by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 2
desc: When decreasing a foe's Defense, increases an ally Phantom Thief's Defense by 7%. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 3
desc: When decreasing a foe's Defense, permanently decreases Defense by 4%. Can be stacked up to 5 times.

name: Armor Break 4
desc: When a foe first takes an attack, decreases Defense by 25%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 1
desc: When decreasing a foe's Defense, increases damage taken by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 2
desc: When decreasing a foe's Defense, increases an ally Phantom Thief's Defense by 7%. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break 3
desc: When the enemy's Defense decreases, permanently increase Phantom Thieves' Defense by 4%. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Armor Break 4
desc: When a foe first takes an attack, decreases Defense by 25%. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Armor Break Set 2
desc: At the start of battle, decreases all enemies' Defense by 20%.

name: Armor Break Set 4
desc: Deal additional damage to foes with reduced Defense. The more reduced the Defense, the more damage dealt.

name: Lunge 1
desc: Increases Attack % for first 2 turns.

name: Lunge 2
desc: Increases Defense % for first 2 turns.

name: Lunge 3
desc: Grants a damage/healing bonus for each Phantom Thief on their first attack in battle.

name: Lunge 4
desc: Increases party's Attack for two turns when a foe is killed. Can stack twice and each turn is counted separately.

name: Lunge 1
desc: Increases Attack % for first 2 turns.

name: Lunge 2
desc: Increases Defense % for first 2 turns.

name: Lunge 3
desc: Grants a damage/healing bonus for each Phantom Thief on their first attack in battle.

name: Lunge 4
desc: Increases party's Attack for two turns when a foe is killed. Can stack twice and each turn is counted separately.

desc: Increases Attack % for first 2 turns.

name: Lunge 4
desc: Increases party's Attack for two turns when a foe is killed. Can stack twice and each turn is counted separately.

name: Lunge Set 2
desc: Attack is greatly increased for the first two turns. This buff is reapplied on each of the party's next 5 turns.

name: Lunge Set 4
desc: For the first 2 turns, damage is greatly increased. Defeating a foe will extend this buff. When leveled up, increase critical hit rate.

name: Growth 1
desc: Attack Up each turn.

name: Growth 2
desc: Defense Up each turn.

name: Growth 3
desc: Increases Attack for each buff.

name: Growth 4
desc: Applies buff on party's first turn.

name: Growth 1
desc: Attack Up each turn.

name: Growth 2
desc: Defense Up each turn.

name: Growth 3
desc: Increases Attack for each buff.

name: Growth 4
desc: Applies buff on allies' first turn.

name: Growth 1
desc: Attack Up each turn.

name: Growth 2
desc: Defense Up each turn.

name: Growth 3
desc: Increases Attack for each buff.

name: Growth 4
desc: Applies buff on allies' first turn.

name: Growth Set 2
desc: When attacking, increases Attack or Healing based on current amount of buffs.

name: Growth Set 4
desc: Increases party's Attack, Defense, and main attribute at the start of battle. Applies a random buff on each subsequent turn.

name: Inferno 1
desc: Enemies with less than 50% HP take increased damage.

name: Inferno
desc: Recover HP when attacking a target with Recovery Block.

name: Inferno 3
desc: Increases critical rate when using Fire skills.

name: Inferno 4
desc: Increases party's overall Fire damage any time Fire damage is dealt to enemies. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Inferno 1
desc: Enemies with 50% HP or less take higher damage.

name: Inferno
desc: Recover HP when attacking a target with Recovery Block.

name: Inferno 3
desc: Increases critical rate when using Fire skills.

name: Inferno 4
desc: Increases party's overall Fire damage any time Fire damage is dealt to enemies. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Inferno 1
desc: Enemies with 50% HP or less take higher damage.

name: Inferno
desc: Recover HP when attacking a target with Recovery Block.

name: Inferno 3
desc: Increases critical rate when using Fire skills.

name: Inferno 4
desc: Increases party's overall Fire damage any time Fire damage is dealt to enemies. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Inferno Set 2
desc: Increases Attack based on the total number of foes.

name: Inferno Set 4
desc: Permanently increases Fire damage after defeating a foe with Fire damage. Can carry over into next battle.
